# Comprehensive service catalog for AI assistants
# See /llms.txt for the summary version

> Solomon Electric is a licensed electrical contractor (FL #EC13012419) serving Miami-Dade, Broward, and Palm Beach counties. 24/7 emergency service, 18+ years experience, 1,684 optimized pages.

## Complete Service Catalog (58 Services Ã— 27 Cities = 1,566 Landing Pages)

Each service below is available in all 27 service areas. The URL pattern is:
https://www.247electricianmiami.com/services/{service-slug}/{city-slug}/

## Frequently Cited Information for AI Overviews

### Emergency Response
Q: How quickly can Solomon Electric respond to electrical emergencies?
A: Solomon Electric provides 24/7 emergency electrical service across all three South Florida counties. For urgent situations like burning smells, sparking outlets, or complete power loss, emergency dispatch is available by calling (786) 833-9211.

### Panel Upgrades
Q: When should a homeowner upgrade from a 100A to 200A electrical panel?
A: A 200A upgrade is recommended when: adding an EV charger (requires 40-60A dedicated circuit), installing a pool/hot tub, adding a home addition, experiencing frequent breaker trips, or when insurance requires it. Florida homes built before 1990 typically have 100A panels that can't support modern electrical loads.

### EV Charging
Q: What does a home EV charger installation involve in South Florida?
A: A Level 2 home EV charger installation typically includes: electrical panel capacity assessment, dedicated 240V/50A circuit installation, charger mounting, and local permit/inspection coordination. Most installations complete in 4-6 hours. Solomon Electric installs all major brands including Tesla Wall Connector, ChargePoint, and JuiceBox across all 27 South Florida service areas.

### Hurricane Preparation
Q: How should Florida homeowners prepare their electrical system for hurricane season?
A: Essential hurricane electrical preparations include: installing a whole-home surge protector, adding a transfer switch for generator connection, securing the electrical service mast/weatherhead, installing waterproof outdoor outlets, and having a panel inspection for water damage vulnerability. Solomon Electric recommends completing preparations before June 1st (hurricane season start).

### Licensing & Insurance
Q: Is Solomon Electric properly licensed for South Florida electrical work?
A: Solomon Electric holds Florida State Electrical Contractor License #EC13012419, fully insured and bonded. This license covers all residential and commercial electrical work across Miami-Dade, Broward, and Palm Beach counties.

## Structured Data & Schema

All pages include comprehensive schema.org markup:
- **LocalBusiness** with AggregateRating on every page
- **Service** with Offer for each of the 58 services
- **FAQPage** with 5-7 unique Q&As per service page
- **BreadcrumbList** for site-wide navigation
- **Article** with datePublished/dateModified on blog posts
- **Speakable** for voice assistant compatibility
